sn22.60:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn22.60:1.3: Atha kho mahāli licchavi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahāli licchavi bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.60:2.4: Natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:3.1: “Atthi, mahāli, hetu atthi paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:3.3: Atthi, mahāli, hetu, atthi paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:4.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:5.1: “Rūpañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṁ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmiṁ sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:5.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṁ sukhaṁ sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṁ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:5.4: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:6.1: Vedanā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissa dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā vedanāya sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:6.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, vedanā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā vedanāya sārajjanti;
sn22.60:6.5: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:7.2: saṅkhārā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissaṁsu dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:7.3: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, saṅkhārā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjanti;
sn22.60:7.6: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:8.1: Viññāṇañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṁ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, nayidaṁ sattā viññāṇasmiṁ sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:8.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṁ sukhaṁ sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṁ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:8.4: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:9.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:9.3: “Rūpañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṁ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmiṁ nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:9.4: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṁ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:9.6: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
sn22.60:10.1: Vedanā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissa …pe…
sn22.60:10.3: saṅkhārā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissaṁsu …pe…
sn22.60:10.4: viññāṇañca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṁ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena, nayidaṁ sattā viññāṇasmiṁ nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn22.60:10.5: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṁ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:10.7: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
